dublin_core.dcvalue: Natriello, G. & Chae, H. S. (2014). The Learning Theater: Designing a Flexible Reconfigurable Space for Ambitious Learning and Teaching on Campus. In Joseph L. Polman, Eleni A. Kyza, D. Kevin O'Neill, Iris Tabak, William R. Penuel, A. Susan Jurow, Kevin O'Connor, Tiffany Lee, and Laura D'Amico (Eds.). Learning and Becoming in Practice: The International Conference of the Learning Sciences (ICLS) 2014. Volume 3. Colorado, CO: International Society of the Learning Sciences, pp. 1709-1709.
Boulder, CO: International Society of the Learning Sciences
The Learning Theater: Designing a Flexible Reconfigurable Space for Ambitious Learning and Teaching on Campus
